metadata.name: Suspicious Encoded And Obfuscated Reflection Assembly Load Function Call
metadata.comment: Detects suspicious base64 encoded and obfuscated "LOAD" keyword used in .NET "reflection.assembly"

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oga6acgaigbmaciakwaiag8ayqbkaciakq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oaogaoaciataaiacsaigbvageazaaiacka')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('6adoakaaiaewaigaraciabwbhagqaigapa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oga6acgaigbmag8aigaraciayqbkaciakq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oaogaoaciatabvaciakwaiageazaaiacka')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('6adoakaaiaewabwaiacsaigbhagqaigapa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oga6acgaigbmag8ayqaiacsaigbkaciakq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oaogaoaciatabvageaigaraciazaaiacka')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('6adoakaaiaewabwbhaciakwaiagqaigapa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oga6acgajwbmaccakwanag8ayqbkaccakq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oaogaoaccataanacsajwbvageazaanacka')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('6adoakaanaewajwaraccabwbhagqajwapa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oga6acgajwbmag8ajwaraccayqbkaccakq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oaogaoaccatabvaccakwanageazaanacka')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('6adoakaanaewabwanacsajwbhagqajwapa')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oga6acgajwbmag8ayqanacsajwbkaccakq')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('oaogaoaccatabvageajwaraccazaanacka')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('6adoakaanaewabwbhaccakwanagqajwapa'))))

output.summary: Detects suspicious base64 encoded and obfuscated "LOAD" keyword used in .NET "reflection.assembly"

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line False positive: Unlikely References: https://github.com/Neo23x0/Raccine/blob/20a569fa21625086433dcce8bb2765d0ea08dcb6/yara/mal_revil.yar, https://thedfirreport.com/2022/05/09/seo-poisoning-a-gootloader-story/, https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/system.appdomain.load?view=net-7.0
